files.content: import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbPage, BreadcrumbSeparator, } from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb"; import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"; import { FoldersIcon } from "lucide-react"; export default function Component() { return ( Home Toggle menu Documentation Themes GitHub Breadcrumb ); }
